Mitigation.Textual:
The following cipher suites were added to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following cipher suites from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: The directive that handles this elements inside the configuration is SSLCipherSuite. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.
Mitigation.Nginx: The directive that handles this elements inside the configuration is ssl_ciphers. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.
Mitigation.Missing: The following algorithms are not supported by the current openssl version: {missing_elements.
